attributes.name: disableShadowDOM
attributes.description: Can be used to turn off shadow DOM; usage not recommended

attributes.name: showNoDataSetAnimation
attributes.description: Defines if the component should show a little loading animation, when no data is set

attributes.name: changeTypeBadgeNameFunc
attributes.description: Can be used to i18n the changeTypeBadge

attributes.name: issueMatching
attributes.description: Used for parsing e.g. #3 in the release notes

attributes.name: issueBaseUrl
attributes.description:
The url for building issue references
If a matching issue is found in the release notes, e.g #3 it will become a link based on that url (the numer will be appendend)

attributes.name: issueLinkGenerator
attributes.description:
Another way for building issue references
If a matching issue is found in the release notes, e.g #3 it will become a link based on what the function returns (null results in no link)
